shortdesc.ph: The configurations for music content center.

plentry.pd: The App ID of the project that has enabled music content center.
使用音乐内容中心时，用于鉴权的 Agora Token。 When your token is about to expire, you can call to pass in a new token.
The ID of the user who uses music content center. This ID can be the same as the uid used when joining the RTC channel, but cannot be 0.
The event callbacks to be received. See for details.
